mapper.select: SELECT s.id, s.estate_id AS estateId, s.deal_year AS dealYear, s.deal_month AS dealMonth, s.deal_day AS dealDay, s.deal_amount AS dealAmount, s.deposit, s.monthly_rent AS monthlyRent, s.trade_type AS tradeType, e.building_name AS buildingName FROM all_real_estate_sales s JOIN all_real_estate e ON s.estate_id = e.id
